Bowo Sidik Dituntut Bayar Uang Pengganti Rp 52 Juta
06 Nov 2019, 13:01 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Mantan anggota DPR, Bowo Sidik Pangarso, turut dituntut membayar uang pengganti sebesar Rp 52 juta. Kok hanya segitu, padahal penerimaan suap-gratifikasi Bowo miliaran rupiah?
"Menuntut supaya majelis hakim yang memeriksa dan mengadili perkara ini, menjatuhkan pidana tambahan terhadap terdakwa Bowo Sidik untuk membayar uang pengganti sejumlah Rp 52.095.965," kata jaksa KPK saat membacakan surat tuntutan dalam sidang di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Rupanya Bowo disebut jaksa sudah pernah membayarkan sekitar Rp 10 miliar ke kas negara melalui KPK. Nilai Rp 52 juta disebut sebagai sisa pembayaran uang pengganti yang belum dibayar Bowo.
Apabila Bowo tidak membayar uang pengganti itu dalam waktu 1 bulan setelah putusan berkekuatan hukum tetap, harta bendanya disita dan dilelang. Apabila harta yang disita tidak mencukupi membayar uang pengganti, Bowo dipidana penjara selama 1 tahun.

Bowo Sidik Demanded to Pay Substitute Money of Rp. 52 Million
06 Nov 2019, 13:01 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Former DPR member, Bowo Sidik Pangarso, was also charged with paying a replacement fee of Rp 52 million. Why is that much, even though Bowo received bribes in billions of rupiah?
"Demand that the panel of judges examining and adjudicating this case, impose additional crimes against the accused Bowo Sidik to pay a replacement fee of Rp. 52,095,965," the KPK prosecutor said while reading the letter of demand in a trial at the Jakarta Corruption Court, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Jakarta Center, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Apparently Bowo said the prosecutor had paid around Rp 10 billion to the state treasury through the KPK. The value of Rp. 52 million is referred to as the remainder of the replacement payment which Bowo has not yet paid.
If Bowo does not pay the replacement money within 1 month after the decision has final legal force, his property is confiscated and auctioned off. If the confiscated property is not sufficient to pay a replacement money, Bowo is sentenced to prison for 1 year.
